CosmereScadrial.Def.AllomanticAbilityDef.label: compound electrum
CosmereScadrial.Def.AllomanticAbilityDef.description: Compounding electrum dims the will. Confidence fades, determination wavers, and resolve slips through trembling hands â€” but each moment of weakness strengthens the metalmind. In time, it will hold enough willpower to defy despair itself.
